item.title: A Minecraft Movie Breaks Into Another All-Time Box Office After One Month As It Nears Passing Another Jack Black Hit
item.description: A Minecraft Movie has been one of 2025's biggest successes so far, and its box office numbers have just been boosted again, giving it another record.

item.title: Martin Scorsese's Taxi Driver Has The Same Story As This Classic John Wayne Western Movie
item.description: Martin Scorsese's Taxi Driver owes a lot to a John Wayne movie, as Travis Bickle is an updated version of The Duke’s classic character.

item.title: DC’s New Superman Movie Trailer Fixes One Of Zack Snyder’s Biggest Man Of Steel Mistakes With Just One Line
item.description: James Gunn's Superman movie trailer completely fixes a major Man of Steel mistake with just one line, and it shows how the DCU understands the hero.
